about_the_game:
Features

- Traditional Visual Novel with multiple heroines

- Over 200 CGs and variations to explore!
- 20+ hours of average reading time
- Developed by waffle, the creator of the Funbag Fantasy series!
- Art by Tomokity, the original creator of the manga and youtube series.

Story

Once upon a time, orcs were feared worldwide as violent warriors who raided, pillaged, and took all manner of women as they pleased until they were finally eradicated in the Orc and Elf War.


However, Donovan - a kind, upstanding, and honest orc - somehow survived the destruction of his species, vowing to the Goddess that he would never lay with an elf upon pain of death. Unfortunately for this fine, noble orc, his quiet hermitage has been discovered by two horny elven sluts who crave nothing more than the legendary girth and prowess of the orcish spearhead!

Can this poor, honorable green soul fend off the deadly affections of his would-be harem, or will the utter debauchery of these sexy maidens move the Goddess to mercy before he reaches "the little death"?

content_descriptors.notes: This title is not suitable for players under the age of 18 or those who may find the following unpleasant or distasteful: consensual and non-consensual graphic sexual encounters between adult men and women, fictional creatures, siblings, and multiple partners.

Minimum:

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128MB
